categories.categoryTag: An immersive 3D environment that tracks player gestures and implements real-world physics to test a player's understanding of core kinmatic concepts, developed in partnership with the Newport-Mesa Unified School District
categories.categoryDescriptionA: Implemented agile processes and frequently made modifications based on end user feature requests
categories.categoryDescription0: Reduced false positives and improved tracking responsiveness by modifying tracking library to include picture taking functionality
categories.categoryDescription1: Reduced game latency by continuously re-writing video to canvas and modifying library to only search center slice of canvas

categories.categoryTag: Automated whiteboarding session with testing and analysis of job candidate coding tendencies
categories.categoryDescriptionA: Implemented TDD to handle various user input errors and routing issues through Mocha Chai testing
categories.categoryDescription0: Maintained persistence of hiring candidate information/updated candidate information with test scores in MongoDB
categories.categoryDescription1: Developed algorithmic parallel to AST for checking hiring candidate coding tendencies (time/space complexity, modularization, etc.)

categories.categoryTag: Automated nursing duties delegator for Ivy Creek Healthcare and Wellness Center, San Gabriel, CA
categories.categoryDescriptionA: Implemented robust testing to handle user errors, integrity of database and routes and reveal flaws in legacy code using Mocha Chai and Supertest
categories.categoryDescription0: Provided nurses with on-the-go access through the implementation of a React Native mobile application, with an API to link directly to the administrator database
